lines.text: Live fast, die young, leave a good-looking corpse.

Until we do away with the type of neighborhood that produced this boy, ten will spring up to take his place, a hundred, a thousand. Until we wipe out the slums and rebuild them, knock on any door and you may find Nick Romano.
Was there a floor show that night at the bar?
There was a dame - a lady.
Was the lady a blonde or brunette?
You think I was looking at her hair?
How can a guy be happy and broke at the same time?
If he's innocent, this is the first time.
You want to do something for me? Remember me in your prayers.
I could still teach you a few, kid. You're just a tin-horned thug and you always will be. You haven't got the guts to be anything else!
You see... in every man's life there are pinpoints of time that govern his destiny.
